title: Plaited cheese and herb scone or bread
ingredients: ['240g (8oz) self-raising flour', 'pinch salt', '60g (2oz) margarine', '120g (4oz) hard grated cheese, such as Cheddar, red Leicester, Cheshire', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh herbs, such as parsley, sage and chives', '1 egg', '150ml (1/4 pint) milk', 'sprinkle sesame seeds (optional)']
